column5: Hi guys would like to see how you carry your stuff  I had this aluminum box made. i measured the back of my machine then i had my buddy make me up a cad drawing, i bought a sheet of aluminum 4X8 and i had a guy cut and weld the box for me..it cost me about $260 in total i know its kinda costly but it should last a long time.. i could have cheaped out and bought the regular aluminum instead of the checker plated kind, but i think it looks much better.. i can fit all my tackle, fishing rods, drinks and live bait bucket with lots of room to spare.. the best part of all is there are no holes in my machine and i can remove box when i want..
that is nice I have been trying to find something for all my stuff and my auger something like that would work great
Times are good in the marble business I see !! LOL  Why no auger mount Rob??
I just built one out of wood. Removal time is just a couple of minutes.
wayne if you look in the backround you will see my buddy jeff he carries the auger so he is my auger carrier
i drive too fast my things would fall out. but i have to admit you can remove it quickly, nice box
How I do it when I use a pop-up shelter.    How I do it with my flip up.
I've gone as fast as 130K with my stuff not falling out. That's what all the cam & ratchet straps ar for.
ok i take it back, i can see those straps working quite well...
